Re: user "killthestate"

Really, because when I went there it says it's $25 to download? Which is why I'm now here.

For those like LuckyCharms who do not understand the English language very well, CCleaner is FREE. I repeat. CCleaner is FREE. The $25 is for the "Priority Support."

Download CCleaner for FREE using this link:

http://www.piriform.com/ccleaner/download/standard

ccleaner is freeware, so what? I didn't realize bittorrent is only for pirated commercial software.  If you scroll down at the web site, there are actually download links that you don't have to pay to access.

He said it because theres newer versions on the actual website, and since its free, you might as well go to the website and download the more recent version, than waiting for someone to upload the more recent version.
No need to pay $25 for "Priority Support," but can donate any amount to support the software. Very nice application and they are generous too, so we should also support them.
Thanks for the upload :) works great !
